item.title: Is chatGPT replacing you? or: The nature of the intellectual act
item.description: I have come across people claiming to fear being replaced by bots, specially chatGPT and other large language models (LLM). In this article I’ll take such statements at face value, despite my reservations about the sincerity of many of them. The short answer is to the question in the title is no, you will not get replaced. The longer answer is below. Figure 1: Rudolph, Conrad. The Mystic Ark: Hugh of Saint Victor, Art, and Thought in the Twelfth Century.
